name: monometallic
content:

chemistry, geology
  specialized made of only one metal: The monometallic phosphates are all soluble in water. Most of the deposits in the rock here are monometallic. Related word
metallic
finance & economics
  specialized relating to monometallism (= the use of a single metal, for example gold or silver, as the standard against which the value of the currency (= money used) is calculated in a particular country): The country adopted a monometallic silver standard. The monometallic system was imposed upon the nation, despite its huge debts.
